subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Omri Casspi, the 23rd player taken in the draft, is expected to be the first Israeli to play in the N.B.A. when Sacramento begins its new season.
snippet: Omri Casspi, the 23rd player taken in the draft, is expected to be the first Israeli to play in the N.B.A. when Sacramento begins its new season.
